message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but I'm only able to offer $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
